mPreUnlockDisplayName.description: The name to be displayed to the player before the tree is unlocked

mDisplayName.description: The name to be displayed to the player after the tree is unlocked

mPreUnlockDescription.description: The description to be displayed to the player before the tree is unlocked

mPostUnlockDescription.description: The description to be displayed to the player after the tree is unlocked

mResearchTreeIcon.description: Icon used when displaying this research tree

mUnlockDependencies.description: The dependencies that needs to be satisfied before the player can use the tree

mVisibilityDependencies.description: The dependencies that needs to be satisfied before the player can see the tree

mNodes.description: The nodes that this tree is made up of

mAssetBundleData.description: Asset Bundle data computed at save time. In cooked builds this is accessible from AssetRegistry

mIncludeInBuilds.description: Slightly misleading name, as this doesn't only apply to builds. If set to Never, it won't show up in editor
